review: a great addition to home entertainment system can be very frustrating to set up with no help from manual or support staff googling will get it done
author: Arthur Scott

review: Best $30 ever spent.  It basically took away the need to use my clunky "smart" TV interface.  Works great on iPhone with app called "TV Cast."
author: Randall H. Brion

review: Great product. It actually works better with iphone apps than android apps.
author: JC "none"

review: work well love how i can watch what ever is on my phone
author: courtney c.

review: Great buy for the money.  I've owned this product for about a year.  One great bonus is the ability to create playlist on YouTube.  Youtube has a ton of full leghth documentaries. The downside is that the Hulu app is not very good.
author: chris
